mapper.select: SELECT * FROM serverdtl where checktime >= #{begintime} and checktime <= #{endtime}
SELECT syscpu,checktime FROM serverdtl where serverip = #{ahostip} and checktime >= #{begintime} and checktime <= #{endtime}
SELECT sysmem,checktime FROM serverdtl where serverip = #{ahostip} and checktime >= #{begintime} and checktime <= #{endtime}
